credit_line: Gift of Fernando and Humberto Campana
title: Sketchbook containing four concept sketches for Trans... chair
medium: Oil pastel, graphite on white wove paper, bound
description: Sketchbook containing four concept drawings for a chair: brightly colored sketches excuted in loose, broad strokes. The Trans... chair is shown in front and back elevations, side elevation and in three-quarter axonometric view. Vividly colored shapes correspond to the placement of plastic and rubber elements woven into the fabric of the chair. Wicker construction is suggested by loose, cross-hatched orange lines.
name: Sketchbook
